creditline: Gift of Fay M. Gallus and Richard M. Sweet
description: image is a deteriorated room in muted colors with doorway leading to a window at L; bed with yellow bedspread at BR; crayon drawings on wall at R looks like a floral landscape with person resting with arms crossed under head; branches from flowering tree arching across doorway at L side; crayons and petals scattered on tile floor across bottom of image; in simple brown frame and white cloth covered mat
title: The Fourth Room of Love (Le rameau de cersier)
